EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2017-10-Turbonomic Azure Webinar.Ignite Attendees Email
EmailTemplate.subject: [Webinar] Managing your Hybrid Cloud with Microsoft Azure
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-and-azure/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wbn-turbonomic-azure]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Thanks again for stopping by Turbonomic's booth at Microsoft Ignite a few weeks ago! We know that the public cloud is becoming a powerful part of the digital transformation strategy for today’s organizations. The Turbonomic Hybrid Cloud Management Platform has recently launched our 6.0 release with increased capabilities with the Microsoft Azure cloud to extend beyond traditional compute to storage and relational database and more. Join us on November 1st, 2017 from 1:00PM - 2:00PM ET <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-and-azure/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wbn-turbonomic-azure]]> as we review Turbonomic and how to unlock the elasticity and value of your hybrid cloud environment on Microsoft Azure.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-and-azure/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wbn-turbonomic-azure]]>
We hope you can make it! - Your Turbonomic Team
